content: > it s 12 days of ear warmers this is > pattern 5 of this series a video for > this project is available > here video 1 **crochet level ** advanced beginner **about this pattern ** a textured ear warmer that is so nice and cozy for wearing you can make this to fit any head size and make it as wide as you would like feel free to have fun with different color combinations a great project to help use up little bits of yarn 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=oxbnboot2pc
